reviews.text: If you come to this place by yourself, think twice. They won't notice you.
I got tacos dorados (tinga de pollo) and it was amazing! They were generous with lettuce avocado etc .❤️ And very friendly. Definitely a hidden gem. I will be coming back :)
Delicious and freshly made when I ordered. Love the option to have pumpkin flowers in my quesadilla. We called in our order and then picked it up.
Definitely the best Mexican food I’ve had since moving to NYC! Tacos and hot sauces were super fresh and delicious. 3 vegan options for filling: mushroom, pumpkin flower, and huitlacoche

Very casual.  Very friendly. Very delicious! I felt I had traveled to Mexico when I went in with the unique menu, decor and grocery products.  I’m vegan and they have three different types of plant based fillings- mushrooms, pumpkin flower and corn smut! Nice sauces and fresh avocado… healthy and delicious (you can of course get meats and cheeses too!)

Esta bien lo que venden, co
O productos comestibles.
Best mexican place to eat from Manhattan to the Bronx! Will eat here till I leave the city! Owner  does everything fresh ! Great taste highly recommend!
